content:
TERM: Universal Correspondence Law

DEFINITION:
The law that governs the relationship between different levels of existence

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
Every action at one level corresponds to effects at all other levels

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
SPR activation affects the entire knowledge network

CATEGORY: HermeticPrinciple

RELATIONSHIPS:
type: HermeticPrinciple; governs: All correspondences; ensures: System coherence; supports: Holistic operation; confidence: high
